## btrsync mount

Create and mount a FUSE filesystem of a sent snapshot

```
btrsync mount [file] [mountpoint] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for mount
```

  -v, --verbose count   verbosity level (can be used multiple times)
